title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Brian Flores after getting fired by the Dolphins and how he proved he can coach while others inside the organization need to get some blame. He discusses Georgia winning the National Championship over Alabama and why the "dynasty" you're not thinking of will likely never end. He also shares his top 10 NFL teams after the final week of the regular season. Plus, Fox Sports College Football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to explain why Georgia was able to dominant Alabama and if Jim Harbaugh is ready to return to the NFL. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
